result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bevan Lydell Boyle Jr

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Bevan Lydell Boyle Jr appeared by video.  Attorney Mindy M. Nolan appeared by video for Bevan Lydell Boyle Jr.  Attorney Joshua Miles Mathy appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Final PreTrial. Court reviewed Defense Motion to Adjourn. Discussion placed on the record. Case remains in trial posture. Defense advised the Court of discovery issues; therefore, State did not object to Defense Motion to Adjourn. For reasons stated on the record, Court GRANTED Defense Motion to Adjourn. Court VACATED Jury Trial date of October 24, 2022. Parties selected new dates. Court ordered case adjourned for Final PreTrial and Jury Trial. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. 

Final PreTrial scheduled for January 19, 2023 at 09:00 am. Hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference. 
Jury Trial scheduled for February 27, 2023 at 09:00 am. Trial will be held in Room 113 of the Safety Building.
Defense Motion to Adjourn; received, filed, and forwarded to the Judge for review.
JusticePoint PreTrial Services Supervision Report dated October 12, 2022; received and filed.

ORDER TO AMEND NO CONTACT CONDITION; signed and filed.
IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the No Contact Order between Ty Yana W-J (DOB 10/11/1995) and the Defendant, Bevan Lydell Boyle, Jr., be modified to allow contact in a school and daycare setting as it relates to their child, K.J.B. (DOB 7/26/2017).
Defendant permitted to have contact with Ty Yana (AKA Tyana) W-J. for the purposes of childcare, daycare, and school activities.

Court reviewed Defense Motion to Modify No Contact Order. Statements by the parties and Defendant. Sate did not object. Court GRANTED Defense Motion to Modify No Contact Order. Defense to submit an Order to the Court.

Defendant Bevan Lydell Boyle Jr appeared by video.  Attorney Mindy M. Nolan appeared by video for Bevan Lydell Boyle Jr.  Attorney Joshua Miles Mathy appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Final PreTrial. Discussion placed on the record. Defense received a new offer from the State, and requested time to review. Parties are continuing negotiations and requested a new date. Court ordered case adjourned for Final PreTrial and Jury Trial. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. Final PreTrial scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 08:30 am. Hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference. Jury Trial scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 09:00 am in Room 113 of the Safety Building.
Defense Proposed Jury Instructions; received and filed.
Defense Motion in Limine; received and filed.
JusticePoint PreTrial Services Supervision Report dated August 28, 2022; received and filed.
Defense Motion to Modify Conditions of Bond; received, filed, and forwarded to the Judge for review.
JusticePoint PreTrial Services Supervision Report dated August 29, 2022; received and filed.
State's Witness List; received and filed.
State's Motion in Limine; received and filed.
State's Requested Jury Instructions; received and filed.

ADDRESS INFO for Bevan Lydell Boyle Jr
Current: 8721 W. Potomac Ave, Milwaukee, WI 53225   (Effective: 08-17-2022)
Prior: 3009 West Clybourn Street #2E, Milwaukee, WI 53208

CASE RE-CALLED. DEFENDANT APPEARED FOR COURT.
Defendant Bevan Lydell Boyle in Court with Attorney Mindy M. Nolan.  Joshua Miles Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

**PARTIES APPEARED VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.**
Court VACATED Stayed Bench Warrant. Discussion placed on the record. Defense requested Final PreTrial and Jury Trial dates. Court ordered parties to submit their Motions in Limine, Jury Instructions, and Witness Lists by the Final PreTrial date. Any Motions are due by the Final PreTrial date. If the parties believe a necessary witness for the State or Defense requires independent representation, they are to make arrangements for that representation through the Public Defender's Office two (2) weeks in advance of the Final PreTrial. Court ordered case adjourned for Final PreTrial and Jury Trial. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. Court advised Defendant to continue compliance with JusticePoint. Court VACATED Calendar Call date. 

Final PreTrial scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 08:30 am. Hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference. 
Jury Trial scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 09:00 am. Trial will be held in Room 113 of the Safety Building.

Attorney Mindy M. Nolan in Court.  Joshua Miles Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

**PARTIES APPEARED VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.**
Case in Court for Status hearing. Discussion placed on the record. Statements by Defense regarding Defendant's non-appearance. State requested a Bench Warrant. Arguments heard. 
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant issued but STAYED the issuance until the next court date. Court ordered case adjourned for Calendar Call. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. 
Calendar Call scheduled for May 19, 2022 at 02:00 pm. Hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference.
JusticePoint PreTrial Services Supervision Report dated May 16, 2022; received and filed.

Defendant Bevan Lydell Boyle in Court with Attorney Mindy M. Nolan.  Joshua Miles Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

**PARTIES APPEARED VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.**
Case in Court for Scheduling Conference. Discussion placed on the record. Defense received paper discovery material and an offer; however, has NOT received digital discovery material from the State. Court ordered Defense and State to meet at least 48 hours in advance of the next court date. Case adjourned for Status hearing, Branch 46. Court advised Defendant to continue compliance with JusticePoint. Status hearing scheduled for May 17, 2022 at 09:15 am. Hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference.
JusticePoint PreTrial Services Supervision Report dated April 14, 2022; received and filed.

Defendant Bevan Lydell Boyle in court with Attorney Mindy M. Nolan.  Matthew Zisi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Detective N. Reaves. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court. Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant.  Case is adjourned to Branch 46.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 15, 2022 at 10:30 am.
JusticePoint PreTrial Services Supervision Report dated March 2, 2022; received and filed.

No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
Court orders defendant TO JUSTICE POINT for supervision LEVEL 3. Defendant to report to JUSTICE POINT immediately upon leaving court. 
IF THE DEFENDANT FAILS TO REPORT A WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with CP and their family, VMG, and TW-J.

Defendant Bevan Lydell Boyle in court with attorney Jason A Findling.  Michael Christopher Schindhelm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Hanrahan, Branch 04.
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 3, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 2/14/22 @ 1p
